name: Save my Family
description:
Goal

Your family is in danger. Defeat the villain who threatens them to complete this destiny.

Reward: Your party gains 10 XP.

Earning XP (Gain 1 XP)

GM-Mode: When you make a decision that demonstrably prioritizes your family's safety over personal gain or party objectives.

Timed Scenes: When you use the 'Defend' action on a family member, or an ally if no family is present.

name: Become a Hero
description:
Goal

You dream of being admired by all. Perform a great heroic act that earns you the public title of 'Hero' from a community leader or settlement.

Reward: Your party gains 10 XP.

Earning XP (Gain 1 XP)

GM-Mode: When you refuse a material reward for a good deed.

Timed Scenes: When your hero reduces a creature with the 'Boss' or 'Elite' tag to 0 HP.

name: Learn from Your Mistakes
description:
Goal

You are determined to learn from past failures. Confront the source or person related to your greatest mistake and successfully make amends.

Reward: Your party gains 10 XP.

Earning XP (Gain 1 XP)

GM-Mode: When you admit a tactical error to the party and suggest a better course of action.

Timed Scenes: After an enemy's attack reduces your HP by half or more, you use an action to heal another character.

name: Learn About the World
description:
Goal

You are curious about the world. Discover a new, uncharted location on the world map and survive its challenges.

Reward: Your party gains 10 XP.

Earning XP (Gain 1 XP)

GM-Mode: When you ask an NPC a question about their culture or history that reveals a new, useful fact.

Timed Scenes: When you are the first hero to enter a previously hidden or sealed area of the map.

name: Champion of the People
description:
Goal

You desire to help those in need. Liberate a settlement or a group of people from the control of an oppressive force.

Reward: Your party gains 10 XP.

Earning XP (Gain 1 XP)

GM-Mode: When you give 50 Gold or a valuable item to a civilian NPC in need.

Timed Scenes: When you defeat an enemy that is adjacent to and directly threatening a friendly NPC.

name: Master of the Craft
description:
Goal

You long to achieve the highest level of skill. Create a unique item or achieve a unique result with a non-combat skill that becomes pivotal to winning a major adventure.

Reward: Your party gains 10 XP.

Earning XP (Gain 1 XP)

GM-Mode: When you use a tool or skill to create a useful item for another party member.

Timed Scenes: When you successfully use the 'Disarm / Expose Flaw' action on an enemy.

name: Fated Savior
description:
Goal

You have been chosen to save a people. Defeat the great evil that is foretold to destroy the civilization you are destined to protect.

Reward: Your party gains 10 XP.

Earning XP (Gain 1 XP)

GM-Mode: When you follow a lead related to a prophecy, even if it is clearly dangerous.

Timed Scenes: When you deal the final damage that reduces a Scenario's main boss to 0 HP.

name: Cursed Seeker
description:
Goal

You must break the curse that afflicts you. Perform the ritual, find the artifact, or defeat the being that is the source of your curse.

Reward: Your party gains 10 XP.

Earning XP (Gain 1 XP)

GM-Mode: When you willingly accept a narrative complication related to your curse without trying to avoid it.

Timed Scenes: After an enemy applies a Condition to you, defeat that enemy on your next turn.

name: Ambitious Usurper
description:
Goal

You dream of power and glory. Overthrow a powerful ruler and take their place as the recognized leader of a faction, city, or territory.

Reward: Your party gains 10 XP.

Earning XP (Gain 1 XP)

GM-Mode: When you successfully use blackmail, bribery, or intimidation to make an NPC of authority do what you want.

Timed Scenes: When you use 'Parley' or 'Cutting Words' to successfully apply a Condition to a 'Leader' type enemy.

name: Eternal Wanderer
description:
Goal

You long to explore the world. You must travel to the three most remote and dangerous locations marked on the world map.

Reward: Your party gains 10 XP.

Earning XP (Gain 1 XP)

GM-Mode: When the party is deciding where to go next, you convince them to travel to a completely new location.

Timed Scenes: When you end your turn farther away from your starting position than any other character.

name: Party Bonding
description:
Goal

You want to strengthen your bond with your party. Complete a major adventure where every party member was reduced to below half HP, but no one reached 0 HP.

Reward: Your party gains 10 XP.

Earning XP (Gain 1 XP)

GM-Mode: When you initiate a downtime scene focused on sharing stories or relaxing with the group.

Timed Scenes: When you use an action that grants another hero a bonus on their roll or restores one of their resources (HP, MP, SP).

name: Cool Action
description:
Goal

You want to be awesome. Defeat a 'Boss' creature in a completely unexpected or theatrical way, as agreed upon by the other players.

Reward: Your party gains 10 XP.

Earning XP (Gain 1 XP)

GM-Mode: When you propose a risky but creative plan that the rest of the party agrees to follow.

Timed Scenes: When you defeat an enemy using damage from an environmental hazard (e.g., pushing them off a cliff).

name: I Found a Friend
description:
Goal

You long to connect with others. Convince a recurring NPC to become a permanent, trusted ally of the party.

Reward: Your party gains 10 XP.

Earning XP (Gain 1 XP)

GM-Mode: When you give a personalized gift to an NPC that improves their attitude toward the party.

Timed Scenes: When you use an action to heal or give a bonus to a friendly NPC ally.

name: Revenge Seeker
description:
Goal

You will not rest until you have exacted revenge. Confront the enemy who wronged you and defeat them personally.

Reward: Your party gains 10 XP.

Earning XP (Gain 1 XP)

GM-Mode: When you uncover a new, significant clue about your enemy's location, plans, or weakness.

Timed Scenes: When you personally reduce your specified rival (from an 'Enemies' card) to 0 HP or 0 SP.

name: Lost Heir
description:
Goal

You seek to reclaim your birthright. Rally allies, defeat your rivals, and be formally recognized as the rightful ruler of your domain.

Reward: Your party gains 10 XP.

Earning XP (Gain 1 XP)

GM-Mode: When you use your lineage or family name to gain access to a place or information.

Timed Scenes: When you defeat an enemy who also has a claim to your title or is a known agent of your rival.

name: Haunted Survivor
description:
Goal

You seek to overcome your past. Confront the source of your trauma (a place, person, or creature) and emerge victorious, thus finding peace.

Reward: Your party gains 10 XP.

Earning XP (Gain 1 XP)

GM-Mode: When faced with a situation similar to your trauma, you choose to act bravely rather than flee.

Timed Scenes: When you successfully make a roll to resist or remove the 'Frightened' condition from yourself.

name: Legacy Keeper
description:
Goal

You seek to carry on your family's legacy. Find and restore a lost family artifact, stronghold, or piece of historical knowledge to prominence.

Reward: Your party gains 10 XP.

Earning XP (Gain 1 XP)

GM-Mode: When you recount a piece of your family's history that provides the party with a clue or advantage.

Timed Scenes: When you use a family heirloom (an Item card from your starting deck) to succeed on a roll.

name: Wanderer
description:
Goal

You seek new experiences. You must visit every distinct region shown on the world map.

Reward: Your party gains 10 XP.

Earning XP (Gain 1 XP)

GM-Mode: When you successfully forage, hunt, or find shelter in a new and hostile environment.

Timed Scenes: When you use the Movement action twice in the same turn to cover a large distance.

name: Where is Love?
description:
Goal

You are searching for a true connection. Solidify a romantic relationship with another character, marked by a significant mutual sacrifice or declaration.

Reward: Your party gains 10 XP.

Earning XP (Gain 1 XP)

GM-Mode: When you succeed on a roll to flirt with, impress, or support a potential romantic partner.

Timed Scenes: When you deliberately place your character between your love interest and an enemy.

name: Redeem Yourself
description:
Goal

You are seeking redemption for past misdeeds. Save or restore the person, family, or community that you previously wronged.

Reward: Your party gains 10 XP.

Earning XP (Gain 1 XP)

GM-Mode: When you publicly accept blame for a past mistake and accept the consequences without protest.

Timed Scenes: When you use a Reaction to take damage that was originally targeting another hero.

name: Treasure Finder
description:
Goal

You seek a legendary treasure. Following a map or a series of clues, you must find and claim the specific, named treasure your quest is about.

Reward: Your party gains 10 XP.

Earning XP (Gain 1 XP)

GM-Mode: When you successfully decipher a riddle or a piece of a map related to the treasure.

Timed Scenes: When you are the character who opens a treasure chest or loots a key item from a fallen foe.

name: Lore Seeker
description:
Goal

You seek to uncover forgotten knowledge. Discover a secret that fundamentally changes the understanding of the campaign's central mystery or conflict.

Reward: Your party gains 10 XP.

Earning XP (Gain 1 XP)

GM-Mode: When you spend a downtime phase researching in a library or interrogating an NPC for historical information.

Timed Scenes: When you succeed on a roll to identify a creature's weakness, resistance, or special ability.

name: Beast Slayer
description:
Goal

You hunt dangerous beasts. Track down and defeat the legendary monster that has been terrorizing the region and bring back proof of your kill.

Reward: Your party gains 10 XP.

Earning XP (Gain 1 XP)

GM-Mode: When you successfully identify monster tracks or other signs, leading the party to its lair.

Timed Scenes: When you are the first character to successfully hit a monster with an attack that exploits one of its known weaknesses.
